title: Thursday Night Debate Breakdown: Noam Chomsky vs. Piers Morgan
description:
Matthew Whalan, Producer Jake and Ben Burgis continue the weekly series of Thursday Night Debate Breakdowns by watching Noam Chomsky's conversation with Piers Morgan. (Note that this is on the shorter side, so probably no postgame tonight.)

Read Matthew's Substack:
